ingredients.ingredient: 6 cups tightly packed chopped romaine lettuce
1 pound cooked boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into strips
½ cup CRACKER BARREL Finely Shredded 100% Parmesan Cheese
¼ cup KRAFT Creamy Caesar Dressing

cookingTips: Tear romaine lettuce by hand rather than cutting to prevent browning
Add dressing just before serving to keep salad crisp
Use room temperature chicken for better flavor integration
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user to assemble the salad components separately and combine just before serving for optimal freshness and texture.
